## PaginatorBuilderOptions.totalItems property

Total number of items to paginate (required).

**Signature:**

```typescript
totalItems: number;
```

## Remarks

Combined with `perPage` to automatically calculate the total number of pages. For example, 100 items with 10 per page results in 10 pages.
